file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-51-01-04 - DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the Digital Audio Panel. B. There are three Digital Audio Panels; one installed in the RH aft console lining and two installed on the main instrument panel. C. The three Digital Audio Panels are similar and the procedures in this section apply to the three Digital Audio Panels. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 23-51-01-000-801-A DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - REMOVAL ALL 23-51-01-400-801-A DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-51-01 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the Digital Audio Panel. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223BZ Main instrument panel 223 RH aft console lining C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • RMU 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/RMU 1). • RMU 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/RMU 2). • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). • VHF 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 1). • VHF 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/VHF 2). • AWS 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/MISCELLANEOUS/AWS 1). • AWS 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/MISCELLANEOUS/AWS 2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-01 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • VOR/ILS 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/NAV/VOR/ILS 1). • VOR/ILS 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/NAV/VOR/ILS 2). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the four Dzus fasteners (1). (2) Carefully pull the Digital Audio Panel (2). (3) Disconnect the electrical connectors (3). (4) Remove the Digital Audio Panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-01 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Digital Audio Panel - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A B A 3. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR (2) DET. B 1. DZUS (4) 2. DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL DET. A 145AMM230125.MCE C EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-51-01 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. MICROPHONE EMER COM 1 COM 2 COM 3 HF PAX BOOM MASK NAV 1 NAV 2 ADF 1 ADF 2 DME 1 DME 2 ID/VOICE SPKR HDPH S.T. MKR MUTE INPH

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-51-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the Digital Audio Panel. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500 AUDIO SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223BZ Main instrument panel 223 RH aft console lining D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connectors (3). (2) Install the Digital Audio Panel (2). (3) Attach the four Dzus fasteners (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • RMU 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/RMU 1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-01 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • RMU 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/RMU 2). • INTPH 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/INTPH 1). • INTPH 2 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 2). • INTPH 3 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/INTPH 3). • VHF 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/COMM/VHF 1). • VHF 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/COMM/VHF 2). • AWS 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/MISCELLANEOUS/AWS 1). • AWS 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/MISCELLANEOUS/AWS 2). • VOR/ILS 1 (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 1/NAV/VOR/ILS 1). • VOR/ILS 2 (Location Tip: DC BUS 2/NAV/VOR/ILS 2). (2) Do the Audio System operational test ( AMM TASK 23-51-00-700-802-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-51-01 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
